name: Hi, my name is Viki ! How can I help you?
about: I am Viki, an artificially intelligent git bot, I will help you during writing you code I will backup files do whatever you want , commit code and maintain your code so that you never lost it !
git init: I have initialised a empty repository!
git add: added all pending files to repo
remote_repo: I have pushed code to remote repo
pull: I have pull the code from origin master
